  CDN Cache Rules define caching behavior for specific paths or content types.

# f5distributedcloud_cdn_cache_rule (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_cdn_cache_rule` resource manages CDN Cache Rules in F5 Distributed Cloud.

CDN Cache Rules define caching behavior for specific paths or content types.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_cdn_cache_rule" "example" {
  name        = "static-assets-cache"
  namespace   = "system"
  description = "Cache static assets for 1 hour"
  path_match  = "/static/*"
  cache_ttl   = 3600
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)
- `path_match` (String) Path pattern to match for caching.

### Optional

- `cache_ttl` (Number) Cache TTL in seconds.
- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
